settings.title: Indulge in the Art of Living.

settings.top_paragraph: Between finding the right furniture for the right price, long shipment periods, and high delivery costs, furnishing your rental space is expensive and time-consuming.
settings.bottom_top: Let us take the hassle off your hands.
settings.bottom_bot: We will furnish, deliver, assemble, and design - all for one flat fee.

settings.step_one_paragraph: Choose one of our furnishing packages. For a flat fee, fill your space with modern furniture and accents. Unlike staging, the furniture is yours to keep.
settings.step_two_paragraph: Select your desired furniture from our catalogue to fill out your package. Featuring pieces from West Elm, CB2, Structube, and more.
settings.step_three_paragraph: Roomme provides white glove service with every delivery. Your furniture is delivered to your door, assembled, and installed.

settings.quote: “I put off getting into the short-term rental market for years - until I found out about Roomme. My property was earning money within a couple of weeks - and I was getting 5 star reviews!”
settings.name: - Isabel M.

settings.link_label: contact us now to get a quote
